fields.label: Asset URL
fields.name: asset_url
fields.instructions: For external links or links that aren't to an uploaded file/document.

fields.label: 404 Message
fields.name: 404_message
fields.instructions: This is the message displayed on the 404 Page.
fields.default_value: Something went wrong with your request.

sub_fields.label: Single Month Format
sub_fields.name: single_month_format
sub_fields.instructions: For a date range within a single month. Use PHP date format placeholders (http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php)

sub_fields.label: Multi-Month Format
sub_fields.name: multi-month_format
sub_fields.instructions: For a date range over multiple months in a single year. Use PHP date format placeholders (http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php)

sub_fields.label: Multi-Year Format
sub_fields.name: multi-year_format
sub_fields.instructions: For a date range that spans years. Use PHP date format placeholders (http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php)
